---
title: Turkey Meatballs
description: Ground turkey meatballs
categories: [Protein, Snack]
cooktime: 30 minutes
date: 2023-07-12
---

* 3 lbs ground turkey
* 1 cup breadcrumbs
* 1 tsp salt
* 1 bunch scallions
* 3 eggs
* 3 garlic cloves
* 1 tbsp worcestershire
* 1 tbsp dijon mustard
* 1 tbsp paprika

1. Mix all ingredients in a large bowl and mix.
2. Use an ice cream scoop to scoop out the meatballs onto a parchment lined baking sheet, and bake at 550 degrees for 12 minutes.
3. Optionally douse in buffalo sauce and toss.
